Posted By: Adam
I currently have the following T206 Southern Leaguers available for trade:


[IMG]http://i152.photobucket.com/albums/s164/aamoniz/1-19.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i152.photobucket.com/albums/s164/aamoniz/111.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i152.photobucket.com/albums/s164/aamoniz/3-5.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i152.photobucket.com/albums/s164/aamoniz/4-5.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i152.photobucket.com/albums/s164/aamoniz/1-20.jpg[/IMG]


I am looking to trade any of the above T206 Southern Leaguers for a T206 Ed Foster (Southern Leaguer) in a comparable grade . . . or I could add money to the trade if your Foster is of a higher grade, which would be fine with me.

Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com to propose a trade!







Regards,



Adam
